summary: The implementation comprehensively addresses all 17 requirements for the GigMarket landing website. All required sections, dashboard pages, routing, and design elements are present with appropriate dummy data. The implementation uses React with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and follows a mobile-first responsive design approach as specified.

hallucinated_features.description: Internet Identity authentication integration with AuthClient and identity management hooks
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists 'Real authentication system' in Non-goals, yet the implementation includes useInternetIdentity hook, InternetIdentityProvider, AuthClient integration, and identity-based actor management

The implementation includes backend/main.mo (Motoko canister) and actor configuration logic. BuildRequest constraints specify frontend-only implementation with no backend integration mentioned in requirements
